changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table charm ( id int not null primary key, name varchar(100), description text, energy real )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table client ( id int not null primary key, surname varchar(100), name varchar(100), patronymic varchar(100), gender varchar(100) CHECK (gender IN ( 'FEMALE', 'MALE')), birth_date Date, actual smallint default 0, charm int REFERENCES charm(id) )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table client_addr ( client int REFERENCES client(id), type varchar(100) CHECK (type IN ( 'FACT', 'REG')), street varchar(100), house varchar(100), flat varchar(100) )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table client_phone ( client int REFERENCES client(id), number varchar(100), type varchar(100) CHECK (type IN ( 'HOME', 'WORK', 'MOBILE1', 'MOBILE2', 'MOBILE3')) )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table client_account ( id int not null primary key, client int REFERENCES client(id), money real default 0.0, number varchar(100), registered_at TimeStamp )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table transaction_type ( id int not null primary key, code varchar(255), name varchar(255) )

changeSet.author: aizhan
changeSet.sql: create table client_account_transaction ( id int not null primary key, account int REFERENCES client_account(id), money real, finished_at TimeStamp, type int REFERENCES transaction_type(id) )
